title: Asian Stocks Set to Fall Ahead of Key US Jobs Data: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities were set for declines as a chill fell across global markets, pressuring US stocks and Bitcoin while boosting demand for Treasuries and gold, with investors becoming defensive in the year’s final full trading week.
content: Asian equities were set for declines as a chill fell across global markets, pressuring US stocks and Bitcoin while boosting demand for Treasuries and gold, with investors becoming defensive in the year’s final full trading week.
